name: Chroma Crash
description:
Welcome to Chroma Crash. Here you'll face titans' of 20th century modern art in a vehicular art marking extravaganza.

RULES:

For each opponent you'll have three runs of one minute. The lowest scoring run will be dropped. The remaining scores will be added together. The contestant with the highest total wins. Waves of the opponent's vehicle will try to stop you from creating your masterpiece.

There are 5 different level layouts, all available from the start. There are 2 cars to start with, another 5 unlockable by defeating each artist. Each opponent's car is based on a famous work of theirs.

Scoring is based on:
-Number of hits on the canvas
-Speed of each hit
-Height of each hit

CONTROLS:
W (or R2): Accelerate
S (or L2): Reverse/Brake
A (or left stick left): Turn left
D (or left stick right): Turn right
R (or Triangle): Respawn
